title: Quick Knowledge
instructions: Name 5 countries in South America in 15 seconds.

title: Act It Out!
instructions: [PLAYER] must act out: a penguin riding a unicycle. Others guess in 30 seconds.

title: Quick Draw
instructions: [PLAYER] must draw: the concept of 'gravity'. Others guess in 30 seconds.

title: Team Balance
instructions: The whole team must balance on one foot with their eyes closed for 10 seconds.

title: Word Chain
instructions: Starting with 'CHAOS', say a word that begins with the last letter of the previous word. Get 10 words in 25 seconds.

title: Memory Lane
instructions: [PLAYER], name the last movie you watched. The team must guess if you liked it or not.

title: Hum a Tune
instructions: [PLAYER] must hum the theme song to a popular 90s TV show. The team has 30 seconds to guess the show.

title: Secret Message
instructions: Solve this cryptogram: 'VKLIHG ZIV GIBFXB'. The answer is 'POCKETS ARE TRICKY' (Atbash cipher).

title: Number Sequence
instructions: What comes next in the sequence: 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, ...? The answer is 13 (Fibonacci).

title: Cue Stick Bridge
instructions: Two players must hold a cue stick horizontally between their index fingers for 20 seconds without it falling.

title: Science Fact
instructions: What is the most abundant element in the Earth's atmosphere? Nitrogen.

title: Silent Story
instructions: [PLAYER] must act out: trying to assemble IKEA furniture with the instructions upside down.

title: Anagram
instructions: Unscramble this word: 'ZARDAH'. The answer is HAZARD.

title: Last Meal
instructions: [PLAYER], what was the last thing you ate? The team must guess one ingredient.

title: Finish the Lyric
instructions: Finish this lyric: 'I see a red door and I...' want it painted black (The Rolling Stones).

title: No-Look Pass
instructions: One player closes their eyes and gently tosses a chalk cube to [PLAYER], who must catch it.

title: History Buff
instructions: In what year did the Titanic sink? 1912.

title: Abstract Concept
instructions: [PLAYER] must draw: 'A stroke of luck'.

title: Rhyme Time
instructions: Name 5 words that rhyme with 'BREAK' in 15 seconds.

title: Spirit Animal
instructions: The team must decide on a 'spirit animal' for [PLAYER]. [PLAYER] must then act out that animal.

title: One-Word Wonder
instructions: [PLAYER] must sing a song using only the word 'ball'. The team must guess the song.

title: Mixed Message
instructions: Unscramble this sentence: 'THE FELT IS ALWAYS GREENER'. The answer is THE GRASS IS ALWAYS GREENER.

title: Logical Leap
instructions: Which letter comes next: J, F, M, A, M, ...? J (Months of the year).

title: Human Bridge
instructions: Two players must form a bridge with their bodies that a third player can crawl under.

title: Art History
instructions: Who painted the Mona Lisa? Leonardo da Vinci.

title: Job Mime
instructions: [PLAYER] must act out the job of a snake charmer.

title: Palindrome
instructions: Say a 5-letter palindrome. (e.g., LEVEL, MADAM, ROTOR).

title: Dream Vacation
instructions: [PLAYER] describes their dream vacation in 3 words. The team must guess the location.

title: Band Name Game
instructions: Name 3 bands that have a color in their name.

title: Synchronized Sip
instructions: The entire team must take a sip of their drink at the exact same time.

title: Literary Genius
instructions: Who wrote 'To Kill a Mockingbird'? Harper Lee.

title: Saying and Phrases
instructions: [PLAYER] must draw the idiom: 'Bite the bullet'.

title: Category Chaos
instructions: Name 7 things you would find in a garage in 20 seconds.

title: Hidden Talent
instructions: [PLAYER] must demonstrate a hidden talent for 10 seconds.

title: Whistle a Show Tune
instructions: [PLAYER] must whistle a song from a famous musical. The team has 30 seconds to guess the musical.

title: Pigpen Cipher
instructions: Solve this Pigpen cipher: [Image of a pigpen cipher message for 'CUEBALL']. The answer is CUEBALL.

title: Visual Sequence
instructions: What shape comes next in this pattern: Triangle, Square, Pentagon, ...? Hexagon.

title: Coin Flick
instructions: [PLAYER] must flick a coin and catch it on the back of their hand.

title: Mythology
instructions: In Greek mythology, who is the god of the sea? Poseidon.

title: Historical Figure
instructions: [PLAYER] must act out being Cleopatra.

title: Compound Words
instructions: Create 3 compound words using the word 'BALL'. (e.g., baseball, basketball, ballroom)

title: Childhood Memory
instructions: [PLAYER] must share a 1-sentence childhood memory. The team must guess if it's true or false.

title: Air Guitar Solo
instructions: [PLAYER] must perform a 15-second air guitar solo to a song of their choice (played in their head).

title: Paper Football
instructions: One player must successfully flick a paper football between the goalposts of another player's fingers.

title: Capital Cities
instructions: What is the capital of Australia? Canberra.

title: Movie Scene
instructions: [PLAYER] must draw a famous scene from the movie 'The Matrix' (the red pill/blue pill scene).

title: Backwards Word
instructions: Say the word 'CHALLENGE' backwards.

title: Pet Peeve
instructions: [PLAYER] must act out one of their biggest pet peeves.

title: Beatbox
instructions: [PLAYER] must create a beatbox rhythm for 15 seconds.

title: Bottle Flip
instructions: [PLAYER] must successfully flip a water bottle and have it land upright.

title: Steady Hand
instructions: [PLAYER] must stand a coin on its edge. It must remain standing for 5 seconds.

title: Opposite Day
instructions: [PLAYER] must describe a common activity (e.g., brushing teeth, making coffee) using only words that mean the opposite of what they're doing. The team has 30 seconds to guess the activity.

title: Abstract Emotion
instructions: [PLAYER] must act out: the feeling of realizing you forgot something important. The team must guess the emotion or situation in 30 seconds.

title: Team Handshake
instructions: The entire team has 45 seconds to create and perform a synchronized 3-move handshake.

title: Draw a Sound
instructions: [PLAYER] must draw the sound of a sizzling frying pan. No letters or numbers allowed. Team has 30 seconds to guess.

title: Two Truths, One Lie
instructions: [PLAYER] must tell the group two true things and one lie about themselves. The team must unanimously agree on which statement is the lie.

title: Odd One Out
instructions: Which of these doesn't belong and why? A car, a bicycle, a boat, a horse (it's alive).

title: Movie Theme
instructions: [PLAYER] must hum the main theme from a movie they choose. The team has 30 seconds to name the movie.

title: Silent Command
instructions: Without speaking or making noise, one player must get another player to pick up the cue chalk and hand it to them.

title: Pun Challenge
instructions: The team must come up with 3 puns related to pool or chaos within 30 seconds.

title: Famous Voice
instructions: [PLAYER] must say the phrase 'The cue ball is a fickle friend' in the voice of a famous cartoon character. The team must guess the character.

title: Invention Timeline
instructions: Which was invented first: the telephone or the light bulb? The telephone (1876, light bulb was 1879).

title: Draw a Verb
instructions: [PLAYER] must draw the verb: 'to float'. Team guesses in 20 seconds.

title: Guess the Doodle
instructions: [PLAYER] closes their eyes and draws a simple animal. The team must guess what animal it is.

title: Human Knot
instructions: Three players stand in a circle, reach across and grab the hands of two different people. They must then untangle themselves into a single circle without letting go.

title: Acronym Attack
instructions: Create a sentence where the first letter of each word spells 'BALL'. (e.g., 'Big Angry Llamas Leap').

title: Everyday Appliance
instructions: [PLAYER] must act out being a toaster, from toast going in to popping out.

title: Name That Instrument
instructions: [PLAYER] must make the sound of a musical instrument with their voice. The team has 15 seconds to guess the instrument.

title: River Crossing Riddle
instructions: You must cross a river with a fox, a chicken, and a bag of grain. Your boat can only carry you and one other item. How do you get all three across without anything being eaten? Take chicken, return. Take fox, return with chicken. Take grain, return. Take chicken.

title: Dream Car
instructions: [PLAYER] describes their dream car using only three adjectives. The team must guess the make or model.

title: Mirror, Mirror
instructions: Two players stand facing each other. For 30 seconds, one player makes slow movements while the other must perfectly mirror them.

title: Animal Kingdom
instructions: What is a group of crows called? A murder.

title: Story Time
instructions: The team must create a story. Each person adds one word at a time. The story must be at least 10 words long and make sense.

title: Movie Quote
instructions: [PLAYER] picks a famous movie quote and says it in the voice of the wrong character (e.g., 'I'll be back' as Yoda). The team must guess the movie and the character being impersonated.

title: Draw a Saying
instructions: [PLAYER] has 40 seconds to draw the idiom: 'a storm in a teacup'.

title: Historical Event
instructions: [PLAYER] must act out the discovery of fire in under 20 seconds.

title: The Next Step
instructions: What comes next in the pattern: 1, 4, 9, 16, ...? 25 (squared numbers).

title: Would You Rather
instructions: [PLAYER] answers a 'would you rather' question (e.g., 'fly or be invisible?'). The team must guess their answer.

title: Object Stack
instructions: The team must stack three different objects found in the room (e.g., a phone, a wallet, a chalk cube) on top of each other. The stack must stay balanced for 5 seconds.

title: Finish the Line
instructions: [PLAYER] sings the first line of a very famous song. The rest of the team must sing the next line correctly.

title: Without Vowels
instructions: Say this phrase out loud without any of the vowel sounds: 'Pocket the eight ball'. (e.g., 'Pckt th ght bll')

title: Planetary Order
instructions: Name the 4th planet from the sun. Mars.

title: As a Chef
instructions: [PLAYER] must describe how to play pool, but in the style of a dramatic TV chef.

title: Invisible Object
instructions: [PLAYER] must interact with an invisible object, and the team must guess what the object is. The object is: a leaky water balloon.

title: Tip Tap
instructions: [PLAYER] must use a cue stick to gently tap a ball on the table five times in five seconds, without the ball rolling more than its own diameter.

title: Book Title
instructions: [PLAYER] chooses a famous book and has 45 seconds to draw its title literally.

title: Go-To Snack
instructions: [PLAYER] pantomimes making and eating their favorite snack. The team must guess what it is.

title: Light Switches
instructions: A room has 3 switches outside, but only one turns on the light bulb inside. You can only enter the room once. How do you know which switch is correct? Flip switch 1 on for a minute, then off. Flip switch 2 on. Enter room. If light is on, it's #2. If off but bulb is warm, it's #1. If off and cold, it's #3.

title: Alphabet Game
instructions: Name an animal for the letter 'A', a food for 'B', and a place for 'C'. You have 15 seconds.

title: Group Pose
instructions: The entire team must pose to recreate a famous movie poster. The adjudicator will choose the movie.

title: One Word Song
instructions: [PLAYER] picks a famous song and must sing it using only the word 'break'. The team must guess the song.

title: Longest Reach
instructions: [PLAYER] must place a coin on the pool table as far from any rail as possible, using only a cue stick to position it.
